Gets the 'authors metric' for a given filter

authors_metric.Rd

Gets the 'authors metric' for a given filter

authors_metric(code, filter, file = NULL, save = FALSE, truncateAt = NULL)

Arguments

code

The account code to use
filter

The filter for the data
file

An optional file name to save a CSV file to
save

Set to TRUE if you'd like a dialog to choose where to save your CSV
truncateAt

Optional number of results - rest will become "Others"

Value

A tibble of your data

Examples


authors_metric("QUIR01BA", "published inthelast week and brand isorchildof 10006")
#> # A tibble: 72 x 7
#>    authorId      authorHandle  authorName  count netSentiment    ots engagement
